data.title: Our Sponsors – North Bondi Surf Life Saving Club
data.text:
Shaw and Partners is one of Australia’s preeminent investment and wealth management firms. With a national presence and $28 billion of assets under advice, Shaw and Partners offers the intimacy of a boutique investment firm, backed by the resources and scale of a major financial group, EFG International. Shaw and Partners offer tailored advice and investment solutions, financial planning and corporate advisory services, and act for and on behalf of individuals, institutions, corporates and charities.

Ric Serrao and the sales team at Raine & Horne Bondi Beach and Double Bay are amongst the most successful real estate practitioners in the Raine & Horne network, and have been serving Sydney since 1883. Ric is the principal and licensee of the Bondi located office, and the team specialises in the Eastern Suburbs properties ranging from functional, funky apartments to high-end luxury homes. They are a proud supporter of local business and community groups, including North Bondi SLSC nipper’s section.

Oceana Funds is a leading Australian alternative investment management firm with expertise in private credit and specialty property equity strategies, and in delivering superior risk-adjusted returns through diligence, asset selection, and structuring. Since inception, Oceana Funds has placed $1.5 billion of financial products with high net worth and institutional investors. Oceana Funds is the proud sponsor of the iconic North Bondi Oceana Funds Swim Classic.

Straight from the Amazon to Australia, Oakberry Açaí is proud to be a sponsor of the NBSLSC. In the three years since opening the first shop in Bondi Beach, Oakberry Açaí has expanded to many other beautiful beach locations around Australia and has become the most popular brand of açaí in the country. Our commitment to making the beaches and the ocean safe and enjoyable underscores our sponsorship of the NBSLSC, and we look forward to many years of a rewarding partnership.

In 1983, with sparkling sand under their feet and warm rays on their skin, Corin and Brian Powell created Running Bare. They set out to produce elevated activewear inspired by the place where it all began — Bondi Beach, Sydney — so women all over the world could own a piece of this iconic stretch of sand. Forever staying true to their Bondi roots, Running Bare is masterfully designed, crafted, and produced locally. Running Bare, believes in quality over quantity

At Metro, we are always looking for new, flexible and faster ways for you to shop to make it easy to get just what you need, when you need it. our neighbourhood Metro store is made for you with a range tailored to meet the needs of the community we serve. As Today’s Fresh Food People we celebrate the best of seasonal fresh with a quality fresh food range tailored for convenience and delivering inspiration for today’s meal.

Spoil yourself for choice at Audi Centre Sydney, Zetland.

An architectural marvel spread over eight levels, there’s a lot to explore at Audi Centre Sydney, Zetland – including Australia’s largest selection of new and pre-owned Audi vehicles. Conveniently located adjacent to the dealership is the state-of-the-art Audi Centre Sydney Service and Parts — the largest and best-equipped Audi service facility in Australia. With a team consisting of highly-trained Audi certified master technicians and certified service advisors.

Audi Centre Sydney, Zetland affords all visitors the chance to experience the Audi brand in its purest form.

JetDryer™ is an Australian brand, established in 2010 as a distributor of high-speed premium quality hand dryers to the Australian and New Zealand markets. Today, JetDryer offers one of the largest ranges of faster, more hygienic and cost-effective hand dryers. From the premium ultra high-speed JetDryer Executive² to the space-saving JetDryer JetLite, we have a model to suit all applications and budgets.

Venroy makes clothes to elevate everyday life through lighthearted escapism. While styles vary by season, all collections are guided by the ineffable sense of freedom that comes with travel.

As an Australian owned, direct-to-consumer retailer, Venroy now has eight stores across Australia, Italy and the US. Locations in Australia span Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and Byron Bay. In 2022 Venroy opened its first international store in Capri, Italy. 2023 saw Venroy open a second international store located in Montauk on Long Island, USA. Our complete offering is also available at venroy.com.

Mayers Fine Food import and distribute over 1000 premium gourmet products throughout Australia and have been serving the dining and beverage needs of Australians for almost 60 years. Their comprehensive range of superb cheeses, dry and frozen goods as well as carbonated beverages, has established them as one of Australia’s foremost specialty food suppliers. The company has faithfully supported the requirements of North Bondi SLSC for a number of years.

Will & Co began in 2013 with lifelong mates Ro Schirato, Sam and Rich Coombes. Through their unique blend of experience – Ro with his proud coffee history having grown up in the coffee world; Sam with his love of surf and design (he’s the man behind The Critical Slide Society); and Rich who, with his brother Sam, started Capital Brewing and Batlow Cider – the trio set out to combine two of the best things Australia has to offer – its coastal lifestyle and thriving cafe culture.

We have had an uncompromising approach to making real, quality lactic butter since 1901. Made only with the highest quality ingredients Lurpak butter has a distinctive, creamy delicate and fresh taste.

Our Lurpak butter process begins with roughly 20kg of whole Danish milk to make every 1kg of butter. The most valuable and flavoursome part of the milk – the cream – is carefully “ripened” before the butter making process. Lactic cultures are added, giving a fresh and slightly aromatic note with the unmistakable creaminess that creates the characteristic Lurpak flavour. That’s it. Nothing more is added, apart from a pinch of salt to our Slightly Salted varieties of butter.

PKF is a fresh, vibrant, and viable alternative to traditional professional services firms. Everything they do, they do to help their clients get closer to their goals. PKF are one of Australia’s leading business advisory, accounting and assurance providers. Their organisation is proud to be an entrepreneurial and international brand that opens doors to expertise from around the world. They are part of a globally respected family of like-minded, separately owned firms located in over 400 cities.
